summary.span: Provides a property, event, and methods for interacting with the network to which the computer is connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Network`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network` object. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上载文件How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| |下载的文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| |检查连接状态Check connection status|[如何：检查连接状态How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传`Order.txt`到http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目标文件已存在，`DownloadFile`方法不会覆盖现有文件。If the destination file already exists, the `DownloadFile` method will not overwrite the existing file. 可以使用的其他重载之一方法以指示它覆盖现有文件，提供用户凭据，或指定特定的超时值。You can use one of the other overloads of the method to instruct it to overwrite existing files, provide user credentials, or specify a specific timeout value. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不会发送可选 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头，某些服务器可能会返回 500 （内部服务器错误）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选标头，必须构造请求使用类。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |下载的文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定超时间隔设置为 500 毫秒。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`设置为`True`，其中显示操作的进度会出现一个对话框; 对话框的包含**取消**可用于取消操作的按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 对话框的不是模式对话框，并因此不会阻止其他 windows 程序中的用户输入。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器没有响应中指定`connectionTimeout`，将取消该操作，并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不会发送可选 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头，某些服务器可能会返回 500 （内部服务器错误）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选标头，必须构造请求使用类。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议发送的信息，包括以纯文本密码，并不应使用用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |下载的文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`设置为`True`，其中显示操作的进度会出现一个对话框; 对话框的包含**取消**可用于取消操作的按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 对话框的不是模式对话框，并因此不会阻止其他 windows 程序中的用户输入。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器没有响应中指定`connectionTimeout`，将取消该操作，并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不会发送可选 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头，某些服务器可能会返回 500 （内部服务器错误）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选标头，必须构造请求使用类。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议发送的信息，包括以纯文本密码，并不应使用用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |下载的文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定超时间隔设置为 500 毫秒。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`设置为`True`，其中显示操作的进度会出现一个对话框; 对话框的包含**取消**可用于取消操作的按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box appears that shows the progress of the operation; the dialog box contains a **Cancel** button that can be used to cancel the operation. 对话框的不是模式对话框，并因此不会阻止其他 windows 程序中的用户输入。The dialog box is not modal, and therefore does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器没有响应中指定`connectionTimeout`，将取消该操作，并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the specified `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled, and an exception is thrown. `DownloadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`DownloadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > `DownloadFile`方法不会发送可选 HTTP 标头。The `DownloadFile` method does not send optional HTTP headers. 如果缺少可选的用户代理标头，某些服务器可能会返回 500 （内部服务器错误）。Some servers may return 500 (Internal Server Error) if the optional user agent header is missing. 若要发送可选标头，必须构造请求使用类。To send optional headers, you must construct a request using the class. > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议发送的信息，包括以纯文本密码，并不应使用用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.DownloadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |下载的文件Download a file|[如何：下载文件How to: Download a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-download-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#7)] 此示例会将文件下载`WineList.txt`从`http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads`并将其保存到`C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`，指定超时间隔设置为 500 毫秒。This example downloads the file `WineList.txt` from `http://www.cohowinery.com/downloads` and saves it to `C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Documents`, specifying a timeout interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsAvailable` 始终返回`False`从调用时`Click Once`应用程序或用户没有。`IsAvailable` always returns `False` when called from a `Click Once` application or if the user does not have . 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable`属性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Network.IsAvailable` property. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |检查计算机是否已连接到网络Check whether a computer is connected to a network|[如何：检查连接状态How to: Check Connection Status](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-check-connection-status.md)| ## Examples 此示例检查属性的状态并进行报告。This example checks the property's status and reports it. MemberSignature.Value: public event Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler NetworkAvailabilityChanged;
.event class Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler NetworkAvailabilityChanged
Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler
public: event Microsoft::VisualBasic::Devices::NetworkAvailableEventHandler ^ NetworkAvailabilityChanged;
member this.NetworkAvailabilityChanged : Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序引发的`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`每次在网络可用性更改事件。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time the availability of the network changes. 可以使用属性的`e`参数，以获取新的网络连接的状态。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要获取的网络连接的当前状态，请使用属性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中，与其他用户界面事件的应用程序的主线程上引发此事件。In a Windows Forms application, this event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这允许直接访问应用程序的用户界面的事件处理程序。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 但是，如果应用程序正忙于处理另一个用户界面事件时将引发此事件，此事件之前，无法处理其他事件处理程序完成，或调用方法。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 不能使用`Handles`语句来处理`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件; 必须使用`AddHandler`语句。You cannot use the `Handles` statement to handle the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event; you must use the `AddHandler` statement. 在 Windows 窗体应用程序中`MyApplication`对象将公开`NetworkAvailabilityChanged`事件提供相同的功能，为此事件，但你可以处理其与`Handles`语句。In Windows Forms applications, the `MyApplication` object exposes a `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event that provides the same functionality as this event, but you can handle it with the `Handles` statement. > [!NOTE] > 许多网络中心可提供网络连接，即使较大的网络断开连接的中心。Many network hubs provide a network connection, even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，对于有线连接，此事件指示计算机和中心之间的连接中的更改。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates a change in the connection between the computer and a hub. > [!NOTE] > `NetworkAvailabilityChanged`由 Windows 95 和 Windows 98 运行的应用程序或由非管理员身份运行 Windows 2000 的应用程序不会引发事件。The `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event is not raised by applications that run on Windows 95 and Windows 98 or by applications that are run on Windows 2000 by a non-administrator. 如果你的应用程序可能会在这些平台上运行，使用属性。If your application might run on those platforms, use the property. ## Examples 此示例使用`My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged`要更新的用户界面的窗体或控件的事件。This example uses the `My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event to update the user interface of a form or control. 此代码应在窗体或控件具有名为`Label1`。This code should to be in a form or control that has a named `Label1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#50)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Ping`方法不是防故障来确定远程计算机的可用性： 目标计算机上的 ping 端口可能已关闭或者 ping 请求可能会阻止通过防火墙或路由器。The `Ping` method is not a fail-safe method for determining the availability of a remote computer: the ping port on the target computer may be turned off or the ping request may be blocked by a firewall or router. 地址传递给`Ping`方法必须是可解析的 DNS，而且不能在加"http://"。The address passed to the `Ping` method must be DNS resolvable and cannot be preceded by "http://". ## Examples 此示例报告是否可通过确定服务器执行 ping 操作是否`Ping`方法将返回`True`。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returns `True`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 替换为`"198.01.01.01"`要成功进行 ping 操作的服务器的 IP 地址、 URL 或计算机名称。Replace `"198.01.01.01"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping. 此示例报告是否可通过确定服务器执行 ping 操作是否`Ping`方法返回`True`，并指定超时间隔设置为 1000年毫秒。This example reports whether or not the server can be pinged by determining whether the `Ping` method returned `True` and specifies a timeout interval of 1000 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#5)] 替换为`"www.cohowinery.com"`要成功进行 ping 操作的服务器的 IP 地址、 URL 或计算机名称。Replace `"www.cohowinery.com"` with the IP address, URL, or computer name of the server to ping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`设置为`True`，对话框中显示操作的进度，其中包括**取消**用户可以单击以取消操作的按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation. 由于对话框的不是模式，它不会阻止其他 windows 程序中的用户输入。Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器没有响应中指定的间隔内`connectionTimeout`，将取消该操作并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议发送的信息，包括以纯文本密码，并不应使用用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上载文件How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传`Order.txt`到`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`showUI`设置为`True`，对话框中显示操作的进度，其中包括**取消**用户可以单击以取消操作的按钮。If `showUI` is set to `True`, a dialog box shows the progress of the operation and includes a **Cancel** button that the user can click to cancel the operation. 由于对话框的不是模式，它不会阻止其他 windows 程序中的用户输入。Because the dialog box is not modal, it does not block user input to other windows in the program. 如果服务器没有响应中指定的间隔内`connectionTimeout`，将取消该操作并引发异常。If the server does not respond within the interval specified in `connectionTimeout`, the operation is cancelled and an exception is thrown. `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` 在应用程序中启用网络跟踪后，跟踪信息输出。`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[启用网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Enabling Network Tracing](~/docs/framework/network-programming/enabling-network-tracing.md). > [!NOTE] > FTP 协议发送的信息，包括以纯文本密码，并不应使用用于传输敏感信息。The FTP protocol sends information, including passwords, in plain text and should not be used for transmitting sensitive information. 下表列出的任务涉及示例`My.Computer.Network.UploadFile`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Network.UploadFile` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |上传文件Upload a file|[如何：上载文件How to: Upload a File](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-upload-a-file.md)| ## Examples 此示例将文件上传`Order.txt`到`http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#2)] 此示例在不提供用户名或密码的情况下将文件 `Order.txt` 上传到 `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads`显示了上传操作的进度，并将将超时间隔为 500 毫秒。This example uploads the file `Order.txt` to `http://www.cohowinery.com/uploads` without supplying a user name or password, shows the progress of the upload, and has a time-out interval of 500 milliseconds. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyNetwork#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyNetwork/VB/Class1.vb#3)]
